backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata describing removal of an old portfolio video embed and listing affected files/components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of all frontend source files for reference or build tooling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables defining OKLCH color tokens for light/dark modes and core global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file containing root div and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component assembling all site sections and applying the stored theme setting.
frontend/src/components/common/GlassCard: Reusable glass-style card wrapper with optional hover and neon effects.
frontend/src/components/common/NeonButto: Custom neon-styled button component supporting variants, sizes, and loading state.
frontend/src/components/contact/useConta: Hook managing contact form data, validation, submission simulation, and success state.
frontend/src/components/layout/SectionSh: Section wrapper that standardizes spacing and optionally applies glass-surface styling.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with social links, copyright text, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Sticky header with theme toggle, navigation, and responsive mobile menu behavior.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/portfo: Defines the PortfolioItem type and a dataset of categorized portfolio items, including thumbnails, descriptions, and optional embedded video media.
Provides media type definitions plus helpers to detect video media and convert various platform URLs into normalized embed URLs.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Portfo: Modal preview dialog rendering video or image content with close controls and backdrop handling.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders the About section with a profile image, description, and a list of editing/design tools.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Implements a contact section containing a form with validation states and a success message.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Displays the hero banner with intro text and buttons that scroll to portfolio or contact sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/Portfol: Shows categorized portfolio grids and opens a preview dialog when an item is selected.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Lists available services with icons and descriptions inside styled cards.
frontend/src/components/sections/Testimo: Displays client testimonials in a three-column layout with quote cards.
frontend/src/components/visual/Backgroun: Renders decorative background gradients and animated floating bubble elements.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, recreating it when identity changes and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and persisted identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollToSection.ts: Offers a helper to smoothly scroll to a page section with a fixed header offset.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Handles light/dark theme state with localStorage persistence and toggling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, neon accents, and glass UI utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers and loads global CSS.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions including color variables, animations, typography, and container settings.
project_state.json: Stores metadata about project status, design guidelines, features, and known issues for the portfolio website.
